name: Final Hours (crazynerd100)
description:
Please see settings for controls and Rebinds. We are Aware of the examine glitch it will be fixed in future update

Final Hours is a game about aliens landing on earth and transmitting a Virus. You are a car crash survivor who stumbles into a strangers home for care. You find out all is not what it seems for this VHS collector.

There are 5 tapes and out of those 52 are Easter eggs the other make the atmosphere and piece the story together
